mapper.select: select m.no,m.title,m.category,m.count,m.m_like,m.type, a.singer,a.content,f.fileName from media m,audio a,mvp_file f where image=1 and m.no = a.no and m.no=f.no

select m.no,m.title,m.category,m.count,m.m_like,m.type, f.filename,f.image from media m, mvp_file f where m.no = f.no and f.image='1' and m.type ='1' and rownum > 0 and rownum <= 11 and m.category= #{category} ORDER BY round(dbms_random.value(0,10))

choose.when: select f.filename,f.image,a.* from (select m.no,m.title,m.category,m.count,m.m_like,m.type, a.singer,a.content from media m left join audio a on m.no = a.no)a, mvp_file f where f.no=a.no and f.image = 1 and upper(a.title||a.singer||a.content) like upper('%'||#{keyword}||'%')

select m.no,m.title,m.category,m.count,m.m_like,m.type, a.singer,a.content,f.filename,f.image,singer from mvp_file f, media m,audio a where f.image = 1 and m.no = f.no and m.no = a.no and upper(m.title||a.singer||a.content) like upper('%'||#{keyword}||'%')
select m.no,m.title,m.category,m.count,m.m_like,m.type, f.filename,f.image from media m , mvp_file f where m.no=f.no and image = 1 and upper(m.title) like upper('%'||#{keyword}||'%')

mapper.select: select a.* from (select m.no,m.title,m.category,m.count,m.m_like,m.type,a.singer,a.content from media m left join audio a on m.no = a.no)a

select m.no,m.title,m.category,m.count,m.m_like,m.type, a.singer,a.content,f.filename from media m,audio a,mvp_file f where upper(m.category) = #{category} and f.image = 1 and m.no = a.no and m.no=f.no
select m.no,m.title,m.category,m.count,m.m_like,m.type, a.singer,a.content,f.filename from media m,audio a,mvp_file f where image=1 and m.no = a.no and m.no=f.no and a.no<=6 order by a.no

choose.when: select m.no,m.title,m.category,m.count,m.m_like,m.type, a.singer,a.content,f.filename from media m,audio a,mvp_file f where m.type=0 and image=1 and m.no = a.no and m.no=f.no order by count desc
select m.no,m.title,m.category,m.count,m.m_like,m.type, a.singer,a.content,f.filename from media m,audio a,mvp_file f where m.type=0 and image=1 and m.no = a.no and m.no=f.no order by m_like desc
select m.no,m.title,m.category,m.count,m.m_like,m.type, f.filename from media m,mvp_file f where m.type=1 and image=1 and m.no=f.no order by count desc
select m.no,m.title,m.category,m.count,m.m_like,m.type, f.filename from media m,mvp_file f where m.type=1 and image=1 and m.no=f.no order by m_like desc

mapper.select: select m.no,m.title,m.category,m.count,m.m_like,m.type, a.singer,a.content,f.filename from media m,audio a,mvp_file f where image=1 and m.no = a.no and m.no=f.no and a.no>=#{no} and a.no<#{no}+6 order by a.no
select m.no,m.title,m.category,m.count,m.m_like,m.type, f.fileName,f.image from media m, mvp_file f where m.no = f.no and upper(m.category) = #{category}
select m.no,m.title,m.category,m.count,m.m_like,m.type, f.filename from (select * from media order by count * m_like desc) m,mvp_file f where m.type=1 and image=1 and m.no=f.no and rownum <= 6

select m.no,m.title,m.category,m.count,m.m_like,m.type, a.singer,a.content,f.filename,f.image from (select * from media order by count * m_like desc) m,audio a,mvp_file f where m.type=0 and image=1 and m.no = a.no and m.no = f.no and rownum <= 6
select m.no,m.title,m.category,m.count,m.m_like,m.type, f.filename from media m,mvp_file f where image=1 and m.no=f.no and m.no > 0 and type = 1 order by m.no
